tests.explanation: The original program correctly raises left to the power of right, whereas the mutant program returns an incorrect value when right is greater than 1. This is because the mutant program only sets the result to 1 when right is equal to 1, but in the original program it sets the result to 1 when right is equal to 0. Thus, a test where right is greater than 1 will result in different outputs.
Both programs correctly return 1 when right is equal to 0.
Both programs correctly return the value of left when right is equal to 1.
